name: Adrenalin (epinephrine in sodium chloride)
indications: adrenalin ® non-selective alpha beta adrenergic agonist indicated : increase mean arterial blood pressure adult patients hypotension associated septic shock ( 1.1 )
contraindications: dilution prior infusion required ( 2.1 ) infuse epinephrine large vein ( 2.2 ) titrate 0.05 mcg/kg/min 2 mcg/kg/min achieve desired blood pressure ( 2.2 ) wean gradually ( 2.2 ) full prescribing information instructions injection .
warningsAndPrecautions: adrenalin ( epinephrine sodium chloride injection ) supplied clear , colorless sterile solution single-dose 250 ml non-pvc infusion bag single function connector system consisting port cap , packaged individually aluminum overwrap oxygen scavenger . supplied : unit sale strength pack factor ndc 42023-273-10 2 mg/250 ml ( 8 mcg/ml ) 10 units ndc 42023-315-10 4 mg/250 ml ( 16 mcg/ml ) 10 units ndc 42023-434-10 5 mg/250 ml ( 20 mcg/ml ) 10 units ndc 42023-500-10 8 mg/250 ml ( 32 mcg/ml ) 10 units ndc 42023-721-10 10 mg/250 ml ( 40 mcg/ml ) 10 units store 20°c 25°c ( 68°f 77°f ) [ usp controlled room temperature ] . epinephrine light sensitive . protect light freezing . keep foil overwrap ready . discard 24 hours opening overwrap . manufactured : endo usa malvern , pa 19355 © 2024 endo , inc. one affiliates . revised : 04/2024
indications_original: Adrenalin ® is a non-selective alpha and beta adrenergic agonist indicated to: Increase mean arterial blood pressure in adult patients with hypotension associated with septic shock ( 1.1 )
contraindications_original: No further dilution prior to infusion is required ( 2.1 ) Infuse epinephrine into a large vein ( 2.2 ) Titrate 0.05 mcg/kg/min to 2 mcg/kg/min to achieve desired blood pressure ( 2.2 ) Wean gradually ( 2.2 ) See Full Prescribing Information for instructions on administration of the injection.
warningsAndPrecautions_original:
Adrenalin (epinephrine in sodium chloride injection) is supplied as a clear, colorless sterile solution in a single-dose 250 mL non-PVC infusion bag with a single function connector system consisting of a port and cap, packaged individually in an aluminum overwrap with an oxygen scavenger. 
                  Supplied as:
                  
                     
                     
                     
                     
                        
                           
                              Unit of Sale 
                           
                           
                              Strength 
                           
                           
                               Pack Factor
                           
                        
                        
                            NDC 42023-273-10
                            2 mg/250 mL (8 mcg/mL)
                            10 units
                        
                        
                            NDC 42023-315-10
                            4 mg/250 mL (16 mcg/mL)
                            10 units
                        
                        
                            NDC 42023-434-10
                            5 mg/250 mL (20 mcg/mL)
                            10 units
                        
                        
                            NDC 42023-500-10
                            8 mg/250 mL (32 mcg/mL)
                            10 units
                        
                        
                            NDC 42023-721-10
                            10 mg/250 mL (40 mcg/mL)
                            10 units
                        
                     
                  
                  Store between 20°C to 25°C (68°F to 77°F) [See USP Controlled Room Temperature]. Epinephrine is light sensitive.  Protect from light and freezing.
                  Keep in foil overwrap until ready to use. Discard after 24 hours of opening overwrap.
